content: This is the home page of GoTrek!
Click 'View Trekking Sites' to view the list of trekking sites near you!
This page shows the list of best trekking sites near you.
Click the 'View Details' button to view details of the trekking sites.
Use the 'GoTrek' logo on the top-left to navigate back to home page.
This page shows the details of selected trekking site.
Use the 'Back' button to navigate to the list of all trekking sites.
Use the side panel to navigate to other screens.
